title: Mill Creek Botanicals Aloe Vera shampoo and conditioner bundle (14 oz each)
description: Aloe Vera Shampoo and Conditioner Bundle will replenish moisture and soothe your scalp with the natural healing abilities of the desert succulent Aloe Vera. Our exclusive blend of Aloe Vera, Argan Oil and Vitamin E fights against dried out follicles to restore your natural shine and moisture balance. This mild formula also softens and protects your hair for outstanding results that you will see and feel all day long.
